title: Cat eared support main - LF adc boyfriend!
body:
HeyGuys!
I'm looking for someone to play Xayah {{champion:498}}  with me. Looking at Rakan {{champion:497}}  makes me hyped, finally a support...
One problem I don't have a E-Boyfriend to play with me- or gift me Rakan.
*add me even if you just want to play

If you're interested please add me: Felf 
(I'm a plat support main)
Thankyou! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Half find this shit funny, half wanna watch and see how it all plays out...

Just jealous of my cat ears OwO.

http://imgur.com/a/TNI8w

Be better if they were the cat ear headphones.

And no.
Gonna love the catfishing that plays out for the next week as Xayah and Rakan get released

Willing to be gifted Rakan.
Shows no inclination to gift Xayah in return.

I no longer doubt your gender.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=GuxieK0K,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-04-19T09:43:17.135+0000)
>
> Willing to be gifted Rakan.
> Shows no inclination to gift Xayah in return.
> 
> I no longer doubt your gender.

I'm a leech, ask me anything.

I'm levelling an Xayah only account because she's hype as fuck.

I may add you.

I'm a diamond level mid player, silver adc. We're improving boys.

Haha- I'd be down!

I peaked plat 3, and currently looking for duo! Be more than happy to play with your smurf aswell!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
